snippet.title: L&C NOW Lori & Chad Daybell Attorneys argue over cameras in upcoming prelim hearings
snippet.description:
On today’s Law & Crime NOW with Jesse Weber: 

Attorneys argue over cameras in upcoming prelim hearings. Prosecutor Rob Wood moved to ban video broadcast. Wood claims pre-trial video recording could taint the jury pool. Media & defense object and argue for public access. Lori Vallow Daybell & husband Chad face conspiracy charges. The state is to present evidence at the couple's preliminary hearings. Remains of JJ Vallow & Tylee Ryan were found in Chad's backyard

Four new arrests in the Polk County, FL triple murder case. Defendants' family & associates face environmental charges. Alleged killer tony "TJ" Wiggins Jr's father & uncle were arrested. The defendant Robert Wiggins' girlfriend was taken into custody. The accused had lived on the same property as the three defendants. "TJ" Wiggins faces 3 counts of murder in the shooting massacre. Robert & "TJ's" girlfriend Mary Whittemore are facing accessory counts. Victims are Brandon Rollins, Keven Springfield, & Damion Tillman.

Johnny Depp UK defamation trial is coming to a close. The Hollywood actor is suing 'The Sun' publisher for libel. The lawsuit centers on 2018 article labeling him a "wife-beater." Justice Nicol reportedly is to deliver a decision within months. Stories of drugs, violence, & lewd acts were recounted at trial. Depp denies hitting his ex-wife Amber Heard; he claims she is lying. Closing arguments are underway in the high-profile celebrity case.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
Law & Crime Now is broadcast live on Network at 5pm ET. It re-airs at 9pm ET.

Watch at home! You may already have access to Law & Crime with your current subscription! Find out here: https://lawandcrime.com/where-to-watch/

Subscribe direct to Law & Crime and stream all broadcast content here: https://lawandcrime.com/stream/⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
Jesse Weber's Guests:
Cathy Russon - Executive Trial Producer, Law&crime
Ecleynne Mercy - Criminal Defense Attorney
Terri Austin - Law&crime Legal Analyst

#LoriVallow #ChadDaybell #JohnnyDepp
